A4.text: The Stratosphere's observation tower is 1,149 ft (350.2 m) tall, the tallest in the United States and the second-tallest in the Western Hemisphere.

A5.text: The tower is not considered a building, according to the Council on Tall Buildings and Urban Habitat.

A6.text: The tallest building in Las Vegas is the Fontainebleau Las Vegas, which rises 735 feet (224 m) and was topped out in November 2008.

A7.text: The Stratosphere's observation tower is 1,149 feet (350 m) tall, the tallest in the United States and the second-tallest in the Western Hemisphere.
